sentence: Iowa already has two early enrollees participating in spring practice: three-stars Brian Allen and Caden Crawford.
author: Kennington Lloyd Smith III
title: Is Iowa football's defensive line poised to make a big leap? Returning experience says so.

sentence: Iowa assistant defensive line coach Jay Niemann discusses Van Ness' growth and that of true freshmen Brian Allen and Caden Crawford.
title: Lukas Van Ness gives Iowa a unique chess piece on defensive line

sentence: “Coming off of an Achilles’, six months, and doing what he can to help our football team win, just having him back was awesome,” Rams center Brian Allen said Thursday.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Super wasn’t good enough for Rams’ Cam Akers
